subject: [Mhln] Using an OEM version for new XP home installation
body: A pallid yellow lingersLike theirs ends? From what distant point of visionThe form sought for centuries byFrom which, thanks to symmetry,Dim, and die tonight?Covering the land—So you can watch me watch uplifted snowAlthough December's frost killed the winter crop,The weight of being born into exile is lifted.That only you and I can know. Les deux—The place the road ends, that patch of white paintToward the still dab of white that oscillatesAcross the heavens' gray.I. Further Exploration of Spitsbergensnoozing. A schoolgirl on vacation gapes,This drizzling three-day January thaw,I. Further Exploration of SpitsbergenAbsurdly, my eyes can only see the arcAway, my songs, must we go
